#summary step by step procedure to use django-survey in Pinax hotclubdefrance.

= How to use django-survey with Pinax=

django-survey can be integrated easily into [http://code.google.com/p/django-hotclub/ django-hotclub].
You can now from a tribe answer the related survey and add/update/delete Survey/Question/Choice.

= Step by step =

 # Download the patch to django-hotclub and apply it attached [http://code.google.com/p/django-survey/issues/detail?id=11 there]
 # Download the [http://code.google.com/p/django-survey/issues/detail?id=11 templates] and unzip them into django-hotclub's template directory
 # Checkout django-survey : svn checkout https://django-survey.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/survey inside the directory called Pinax in django-hotclub


That all you are now ready to go.
